caseSubject: Suit for specific performance/Agreement to sell
caseTitle: M/s DW Pakistan Private Limited Lahore v. Begum Anisa Fazl-i-Mahmood and others
tagline: Readiness & willingness is a condition for relief of specific performance. Appendix “A” of the First Schedule of CPC (Form-47), specimen for drafting plaint in the suit for specific performance. Section 24 of the Specific Relief Act 1877. Section 6 & 84 of the Negotiable Instruments Act. Stale Instrument and stale cheque
